transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Yes

Customer: Tannu Chauhan naam se baat ho rahi hai customer care pe baat karna chah raha tha main Rahul baat kar raha hun.

Executive: Ji bataiye main Tannu ka manager bol raha tha.

Customer: Okay manager okay sir sir main Rahul baat kar raha hun MS Enterprises se.

Customer: Sir na maine abhi sir hamare yahan pe na ek new joining hai.

Customer: Ha ha.

Customer: Aur ha to wo kya IndiaMART matlab wo dedicatedly IndiaMART dekhenge.

Customer: To unko sir ek training karani thi chhoti si.

Customer: Taki wo IndiaMART chala sake aur hamara jo abhi absence hota hai hum jo portal pe itna active nahi ho pate hain ye kam se kam teen char saal se aise hi ho raha hai theek hai.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Main abhi ek kam karta hun aapki jo new joining hai wo abhi office aa gayi hai kya?

Customer: Nahi nahi wo actually kya hai na wo unhone mujhe samay diya 3:30 se 4 ke wo actually kya work from home wale pattern pe maine unko kam pe kiya hai.

Executive: Theek hai.

Customer: To to main kya hai wo she is very fast she has been into many companies like usme previously kafi kam kiya hua hai.

Customer: To bas wo aisa hai ki ek initial jo IndiaMART portal ka jo training hai wo apan de de unko to wo samajh jayenge fir to used to ho jate hain saat aath din mein to koi issue nahi aata hai.

Customer: To aur main unko offer vagaira install karna chah raha tha.

Executive: To aap number bataiye na aapne bata sakte hain usko main note kara deta hun.

Customer: Ji?

Executive: Ek bar number confirm kar dijiyega mujhe.

Customer: Unka number main bataun?

Customer: Haan unka number.

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello yes mam main Rahul baat kar raha hun.

Executive: Okay hi good morning kaise hain Rahul sir aap?

Customer: Main bilkul mam bilkul fine I am fine mam humne abhi na ek matlab main aapko brief karta hun abhi humne ek jo IndiaMART portal ko jo handle karenge to wo ek hamare matlab kafi family ke hi karib hai.

Customer: To wo handle karenge theek hai since hum log hai na isme itni presence de nahi pate hain hamara jo staff hai jo main staff hai means jo ground pe staff hai they are unable to give appropriate time to IndiaMART so we have hired somebody who will dedicatedly handle IndiaMART portal so now from today onwards she will she wants training a little training.

Executive: Okay.

Executive: Okay no issues.

Customer: So generally she gets free by 2 2:30 so afterwards she will be matlab she will be handling our portal and she will be making calls and she will be attending calls and will quote give quotations and all right.

Executive: Right right.

Customer: Yes to abhi unko ek training chahiye thi unhone time mujhe bataya hai.

Customer: Ek minute she will call you to abhi mujhe bataiye unko mujhe jaise training karwani hai to wo kaise hogi?

Executive: Sir main unke sath mein ek video meeting connect kar lungi jisme unko pura guide kar dungi system portal ke kaise use karna hai.

Customer: To unko unko unko laptop pe is karna chahiye?

Executive: Yes sir bilkul agar wo aapki as a employee work kar rahi hai to main suggestion yahi dungi sir agar system pe karenge to jyada better rahega kyuki system pe bahut sare option available rehte hain.

Executive: So system ya laptop aap provide kar sakte hain.

Customer: Ek minute mam main unse wo bhi baat kar raha hun.

Executive: Ji ji aap kar lijiye.

Customer: Haan mam to main kam karta hun mera unke pass system to nahi hai par aaj ki jarurat hai system mein to theek hai.

Executive: Sir agar to wo matlab IndiaMART portal kaise handle karenge agar system pe karenge to main system se guide karungi.

Customer: Jaisa main jaisa main abhi aap aapke calls jo aate hain wo mere pass mein aur Ankit ke pass mein aate hain.

Executive: Right.

Customer: Theek hai to aaj hai na hum ek ek sim card lenge wo sim card unko denge just to handle IndiaMART wo jo number rahega wo number usko feed kar denge for the first priority to first priority pe wo number unke pass rahega to wo pick karenge then wo calls bhi karenge to jitni hamari buyleads hai wo roz consume bhi karenge aur wo pura ek data bana ke aur customers ko reach out karenge right aap samajh rahe hain.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: To bas humko ye hai ki aap unko portal ki matlab unko portal samjha do ki what it is aur short mein bata dena bahut samajhdar hai wo bahut she is very quick bahut padhi likhi hai wo.

Executive: Quick learner okay okay.

Customer: Hai na to aap samajh rahe hain to abhi aaj to aap unko ek initial ek laptop pe training de do first of all fir ek ya do din mein hamare pass mein number aayega to hum usko hum matlab aaj hi main activate abhi main number bulwa leta hun activate karke ek unko jio ka ek number de deta hun main alag se.

Executive: Okay theek hai.

Customer: Hai na ek to main ye kar deta hun ki ek company ka data company ke pass mein rahega ek unko phone dena hai main phone de deta hun bas itni si baat hai.

Executive: Ji sir theek hai done to sir main ek cheez bolna aur chahungi ki unke pass proper laptop rahega kam karne ke liye ya fir wo mobile se lead vagaira purchase karengi.

Customer: Nahi nahi wo to unke pass waise laptop bhi hai.

Executive: Okay main isliye confirm kar rahi hun sir agar jaise wo proper laptop se hi purchase karengi to main laptop pe training dungi agar wo mobile se purchase karengi to main mobile pe training dungi agar aap kahenge dono pe training de do to main dono pe de dungi.

Customer: Nahi nahi wo to dekho it is impossible to work on laptop since she is a house matlab housewife wo hamare theek hai to wo 2 baje ya 2:30 baje free hote hain to unhone bola sir main yadi aisa hai to bole main ha main matlab mere yadi aisa hai ki jab mujhe time milega to main ghar din mein ek ghanta main isko de dungi aur jab mere pass calls aayenge to main receive kar lungi at any point of time aur jo quotations banane hain jo mujhe mails karne hain wo main hatho hath kar dungi koi problem nahi hai theek hai bas mujhe ek initial training mil jayegi how it works mujhe buyleads maine sab bata diya wo samajh bhi gayi par ek main aapke through interface chahta hun taki ek unko professional training mil jaye 15 20 25 minute ki.

Executive: Okay to sir aapko ek to ek to ek to ek to ye kaun sa ek to ek to inka jo inko ek to wo download karwa lena aap kaun sa IndiaMART ka jo application hai.

Executive: Application okay done.

Customer: Haan aur aap unka number likh lijiye.

Executive: Haan number bata dijiye sir.

Customer: 951

Executive: 951

Customer: 65

Executive: 65

Customer: 75

Executive: 75

Customer: 354

Executive: 354

Executive: Main repeat kar rahi hun sir 9516575354.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Hello theek hai naam kya hoga mam ka?

Customer: Batul

Executive: Sorry

Customer: Batul Batul

Executive: Okay theek hai main inko connect kar leti hun.

Customer: Hai na ha aap inko inko kitne baje karna hai aapko connect pehle unko bol dena unhone jo mujhe time diya hai abhi to wo school mein hai wo padhate hain hamare school mein.

Executive: Okay.

Customer: To 3:30 baje unko call kar lena aap theek hai.

Executive: Done sir main 3:30 baje connect kar leti hun.

Customer: Haan main unko ek phone ek alag se phone aur ek laptop wo bhi kar dete main unko ek alag se dedicate kar deta hun.

Executive: Okay done sir theek hai main inko abhi 3:30 baje connect kar lungi sir and one more thing sir abhi jaise aapne humne customer care pe call kiya tha to wo close kar de rahi hun concern ko main aur inko main 3:30 baje connect karke proper ek training de deti hun theek hai sir.

Customer: Bas bas bas bas bas ha wo to main koi concern to kuch bhi.

Executive: Haan matlab wo training training screen share ho jati hai jaise main aapke sath mein screen share karna chahun abhi to screen isi pe share ho jati hai.

Executive: Haan bilkul sir google agar hum google meet karenge na to us pe screen share ho jati hai.

Customer: Nahi nahi abhi jaise IndiaMART pe maine bola aapne bola ki jaise share screen now to abhi ye maine is pe ek option aaya hai share screen now to waiting for executive to connect to ye screen share ho jati hai kya?

Executive: Bilkul sir share ho jati hai abhi share ho rakhi hai aap.

Customer: Dekho aap abhi connected hai abhi aap connected hai.

Executive: Right right abhi share kar diya hai aapne abhi aap kaise ab isko use kar sakte ho aap mere mere isko IndiaMART ko.

Executive: Sir main IndiaMART ko use nahi kar sakti hun aapko sirf IndiaMART ka application mujhe dikh raha hai to agar aap kahhenge ki is pe click karenge main aapko guide kar sakti hun ki sir is pe click karoge to ye hoga abhi aapne end kar diya hai yes sir.

Customer: Okay okay okay okay right right right right right.

Executive: Theek hai to isme ye new option isiliye hai ki agar aap koi bhi screen apna share karke agar aap mujhe application dikhana chahte ho aapko koi bhi challenges aa rahe hain to main aapko proper guide kar paungi usme.

Customer: Okay okay.

Executive: Theek hai bas ji main 3:30 baje mam ko connect karke proper IndiaMART ki training de dungi hun mobile ki bhi de dungi aur inko laptop pe kaise agar work karte hain to laptop ki bhi training de dungi isse unko koi bhi problem nahi aaye sir.

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Theek hai sir theek hai mam theek hai theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Okay baki agar kuch bhi rehta hai sir ya koi bhi challenges abhi aapko aaye ya kuch bhi aata hai to main aapko connect kar lungi baki.

Customer: Aapko aapko aapko jaise unhone 3:30 baje ka bola hai to aap unko ek reminder call kar dena 3:15 baje.

Executive: Aur unko puch lena mam aap ready ho to aap wo 3:30 baje set ho jayenge jo aapki aur apni problem hai na jo is pe screen time aap bol rahe ho ki samay nahi de pa rahe hain sir aap to apni ranking bhi kharab hoti hai to ye sab cheeze samasyaen khatam ho jayegi us cheez se.

Executive: Yes sir.

Customer: Hai na theek hai okay done sir okay thank you so much sir thank you thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs training for new employee.

- Wants to know how to use IndiaMART effectively.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting for training.

- Executive will connect at 3:30 PM for training.

- Executive will provide training on both mobile and laptop.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call at 3:15 PM as a reminder.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- training, indiaMART portal, laptop, mobile, screen share
